Tacit Dynamics

Developer of FolderSync for Android

Welcome to Tacit Dynamics

Tacit Dynamics is an independent Danish software development company. We develop native apps for Android. If you need help with our apps please see the support page.

Tacit Dynamics focuses on developing applications for the Android platform. We have currently released FolderSync, a file syncing app that support Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox and many others.

Contact us for further inquiries.
